document_data.name: Karel Mahorne
document_data.mainbody: '''Karel Mahorne''' was a [[human]] [[cleric]] of [[Mielikki]] who dedicated her life to the curing of [[lycanthrope]]s and who was the leader of the [[Silver Stake]], an organization with this goal.{{Cite web/The Search for the Circle of Vehlarr/Part Two}}
document_data.Activities: Because of her by then considerable age, during the years following the [[Time of Troubles]], she worked exclusively from the company's compound near [[Baldur's Gate]].
document_data.History: Early in her life, Karel's husband and child were slain by a [[werewolf]] pack. She went on to form the Silver Stake with [[Dram Kallen]] and they were joined by others who had a similar cause.
